title: Great for hiking
content: First and foremost, these are Not leggings which is what I wanted. These joggers are so comfortable and I love wearing them so much that I forget that I have a plethora of pants to wear. I love that they are not tight on my thighs or calf’s but also not baggy. They are perfect. If you are looking for an all occasion (possibly) then buy these. I bought a large based on what was suggested and I have more weight on than I would prefer, but with the yoga style waist and the cuffed leg I feel they are a winner even if you might be taller than 5’6

title: Great workout pant!

title: Verified Purchase
content: These were incredibly soft and fit great. 5'10, 250 lbs, I ordered the XXL and they fit great, great mix of fitted and baggy but not hanging off and reach down to my ankle. Buttery soft. I did think they would be thick enough to hide cellulite but that is not the case. They seem very breathable. I will probably keep them.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2024

title: Super soft!
content: I really do like these joggers. They are the right amount of thickness. I have wanted this shade of dark camo and that is perfect. They would work for working out, but I more wear them for stuff I am going to for that cute, comfy, workout look. I have gotten so many compliments on them. They are true to size. I only rate it a 4 because I already have some pilling in a couple places, and I have not had them that long.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I had such high hopes for these lululemon dupes. The waist band is not like lululemon at all, but very tight and thick. The pants in general are much thicker than I had expected, especially since I followed the sizing chart. They fit me more like leggings than they did joggers. So keep that in mind if you are wanting more of a jogger than a legging. The pants were uncomfortably tight, but the material did still feel like it was of great quality. Just not the buttery soft material I was expecting.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Ok so full transparency I’m usually a Colorful Koala person but these have good reviews and are a couple bucks cheaper so I got a color that Colorful Koala doesn’t have to compare. These are nice. But they’re not as good as my go to. They are less buttery and a slightly shinier feel (idk how else to describe it ok), but not like in a super bad way? They’re definitely a little more sturdy feeling than CKs but the downside is that there’s a seam at the top of the waistband, so what should be a nice tummy control panel becomes an instant mom pooch enhancer. Which as a mom with a pooch, I don’t love. They are longer than CKs so if you’re a tall gal that might be nice. If you’re an average or short gal it’s not ideal if you like your joggers to sit snug above your ankle. Pocket size and shape seem super comparable, and the leg fit is really similar besides length.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024

title: Returned. Small size was about 4 inches too large on both sides.
content: Overall they seem nice and I’ll keep them, but I probably won’t buy them again I’ll stick with my CKs.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I usually get an XS in joggers and leggings, but i needed a size Small in these.  The highwaisted waistband is tiny.  Though that’s not necessarily a problem area for me, I’m straight like a boy there.  No curves.  No tiny cinched waist.  I probably could have used another 1/2”-1” there.  But the fabric of the waistband is soft and comfy, so it’s not bothersome.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2024
